item.title: 社内メモ：ガネットのニュース部門社長兼USAトゥデイEICのニコール・キャロルが退任、マイケル・マッカーター常務が暫定EICに就任（Max Tani/@maxwelltani)

Max Tani / @maxwelltani:
Internal memo: Gannett news division president and USA Today EIC Nicole Carroll is stepping down; Managing Editor Michael McCarter takes over as Interim EIC  —  Gannett news division president and USA Today EIC Nicole Carroll is stepping down, per a note that just went out to staff. item.title: 1996年に創刊されたMaximum PCとMacLifeが2023年4月号をもって廃刊となり、米国におけるコンピュータ雑誌の時代への弔辞となる（Harry McCracken/Technologizer)
item.description:
Harry McCracken / Technologizer:
A eulogy for the era of computer magazines in the US, as Maximum PC and MacLife, both of which started in 1996, abandon print after their April 2023 issues  —  The April issues of Maximum PC and MacLife are currently on sale at a newsstand near you—assuming there is a newsstand near you.

item.title: メディア格付け評議会は、ニールセンが視聴者を過小評価するなどの問題を修正した後、2021年に停止したニールセンの全国テレビ視聴率認定を回復することを決議した（Megan Graham/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Megan Graham / Wall Street Journal:
The Media Rating Council votes to restore Nielsen's national TV ratings accreditation, suspended in 2021, after Nielsen fixed issues, like undercounting viewers  —  The TV ratings giant's seal of approval had been suspended by the Media Rating Council since 2021

item.title: Twitter、オーストラリアのABC、カナダのCBC、スウェーデンのSVTなど国際的な報道機関のアカウントに「政府系メディア」のラベルをさらに展開（Amanda Silberling/TechCrunch)
item.description:
Amanda Silberling / TechCrunch:
Twitter rolls out more “Government-funded Media” labels on the accounts of international news outlets, including Australia's ABC, Canada's CBC, and Sweden's SVT  —  Twitter is rolling out more “government-funded media” labels on the accounts of international news outlets.

item.title: 情報源: 広告売上が史上初めて減少した後、Metaは広告主に対する威勢の良い口調を捨て、Reelsの広告を最大25%割引するなど、甘味を提供している（Sylvia Varnham O'Regan/The Information）。
item.description:
Sylvia Varnham O'Regan / The Information:
Sources: after its first-ever drop in ad sales, Meta ditched its brash tone with advertisers and is offering sweeteners, like up to a 25% discount for Reels ads  —  After suffering its first-ever drop in ad sales, Meta Platforms has abandoned its once-brash tone with advertisers in favor of a more flexible approach to winning business.

item.title: Spotifyは今後数カ月でGimletのポッドキャストの一部について、ペイウォールを取り下げ、独占ルールを変更する予定、Spotifyは2019年にGimletを$230Mで買収（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Spotify plans to drop its paywall and change its exclusivity rules for some of Gimlet's podcasts in the coming months; Spotify acquired Gimlet for $230M in 2019  —  Staff at the podcast studio Gimlet staff have been told in recent weeks that Spotify plans to drop its subscription wall around some of the studio's shows.

item.title: AMC Networksは、2023年10月までにAMC+の安価な広告付きティアを展開する計画で、AMC+は現在月額8.99ドル（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:

AMC Networks plans to roll out a less expensive, ad-supported tier of AMC+ by October 2023; AMC+ currently costs $8.99 per month  —  Season 2 of the Rhea Seehorn digital series 'Cooper's Bar' will expand to half hour and debut on IFC, as company expands slate of branded originals.
